name: Diceordie
description:
You are a happy cat, but your time has come.

Defeat death in a dice game and perhaps you can return to your owner.

-----------------------

Use the mouse to play.

Left button to select a power

Right button to clear the power selection

------------------------

This game has been an exercise and I have learned a lot during this development. If you have enjoyed it, you can leave a comment. Thank you very much for playing!
